Don't forget to create the volume directories on the host file system.

mkdir -p /volume1/docker/znc/config
templates.description: [Znc](http://wiki.znc.in/ZNC) is an IRC network bouncer or BNC. It can detach the client from the actual IRC server, and also from selected channels. Multiple clients from different locations can connect to a single ZNC account simultaneously and therefore appear under the same nickname on IRC.
